p: The current cross-sectional study was conducted in Sistan and Baluchistan Province of Iran. This province, located in Southeastern Iran with an area of 180,726â€‰km 2, is the only province of Iran sharing border with Pakistan. The climate in this province varies from moderate in North to semi tropical in South. It has the lowest rainfall from April to November and the southern part is affected by monsoons, which cause extensive rainfall and flooding every three to 5 years [ 15].
